Description: Round-topped sandstone stela bearing names and epithets of Senusret III above six rows of Hieroglyphic text describing construction of fortress at Elephantine.
Curator's comments: Published: PM V: p. 242. HTBM 4: Plate 10.
Exhibition history: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2014-2015 9 Oct-26 Jan. Palais des Beaux Arts de Lille. Senusret III.
